resources.string:
App created by Quinny898

Stickers from Google Hangouts iOS app and Google+
Animated previews failed to load, your sticker will still be animated though!

How to use
Open Hangouts, and select the chat you want the sticker for
Tap the attach button (the paperclip) and select "Attach Photos"
Select "Pick a sticker" from the options
Choose the sticker you want
Enter a caption and send!
You can show it again from the sticker add screen, under the options menu
A reboot may be required for these changes to take place
Add an "Add sticker" option to Hangouts
